document.full_text: peter thiel, the technology entrepreneur and venture capitalist, tells cnbc why he is giving $100,000 to 24 young adults to stop going to school and start focusing on building the tech companies of tomorrow.
document.title: peter thiel tells why he will pay you to drop out of school
lines_and_colors: peter thiel, the technology entrepreneur and venture capitalist, tells cnbc why he is giving $100,000 to 24 young adults to stop going to school and start focusing on building the tech companies of tomorrow.
